name: Smashball (itch)
description:
Welcome to Smashball!

In Smashball the goal is to get inside the point zone surrounding the ball, and stay there. As long as you're in the zone, you get points! You have a gun which shoots blasts that, upon explosion, knock the ball away. Use this to return it to your control from afar, or push it out to a safer place.

---

This project was uploaded for "My First Game Jam (1/16/16)" and I had quite a bit of fun with it. Some life stuff happened so I didn't get as much time as I'd have liked, but I went from knowing 0% Unity and C# to making what you're (hopefully) playing here.

It's sort of a 2D (super) demake of a game I created in Halo: Reach with the help of some friends. It's SUPPOSED to be multiplayer, but I didn't have time to figure that out/test, so it's this for now. One day, I'll make my own version of it, 3D and everything. Until then, I've got this, haha.

Thanks for playing! <3
